UniprotID	P41970
Accession	P41970;B2R6S6;Q6FG57;Q6GU29;Q9UD17
EntryName	ELK3_HUMAN
ProteinName	ETS domain-containing protein Elk-3 (ETS-related protein ERP) (ETS-related protein NET) (Serum response factor accessory protein 2) (SAP-2) (SRF accessory protein 2)
GeneName	ELK3 NET SAP2
Length	407
Function	May be a negative regulator of transcription, but can activate transcription when coexpressed with Ras, Src or Mos. Forms a ternary complex with the serum response factor and the ETS and SRF motifs of the Fos serum response element.
Subcellular Location	Nucleus
